Authors: Pradipta I.A., Maulana Y., Sanjaya Jio I.M.
Title: Factors that affecting purchase decision on automotive workshop official store in e-commerce
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, International Marketing Program, Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bina Nusantara University, Faculty of Economics Communication, Tourism Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Pradipta, I.A., BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, International Marketing Program, Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Maulana, Y., Bina Nusantara University, Faculty of Economics Communication, Tourism Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sanjaya Jio, I.M., BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, International Marketing Program, Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This research is conducted to find out what factors that affecting purchase decision in automotive workshop official store in E-commerce, considering that social media users and vehicle owners will increase continuously. In its implementation, this research uses quantitative methods and uses path analysis as a method of analyzing data that has been collected, as many as 120 respondents by spreading online's questionnaires. The results of this research show that social media marketing has a significant influence on brand awareness. And brand awareness has a significant influence on purchase decision. Also, social media marketing has a positive and significant influence on purchase decisions through brand awareness. There is a significant effect between Social Media Marketing, brand awareness on purchase decision. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Brand awareness; Purchase decision; Social media marketing
Index Keywords: Electronic commerce; Information management; Regression analysis; Social networking (online); Surveys; Brand awareness; Path analysis; Purchase decision; Quantitative method; Social media; Social media marketings; Sales
